titleStmt.title: O Lord of hosts, almighty and eternall God, whose high and glorious name is King of Kings and Lord of Lords ...
titleStmt.author: Bulkeley, Lancelot, 1568?-1650.
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

notesStmt.note: "28 of February. 1642: I require all preachers and chaplaines of the army to use the above forme of praier at all times of publique praier in all expeditions. Ormonde."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
